scripts.copyjs: cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js sortiment/static/alpine.min.js && cp node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.min.js sortiment/static/htmx.min.js
scripts.css-dev: npm run copyjs && tailwindcss -i sortiment/css/app.css -o sortiment/static/app.css --watch
scripts.css-prod: npm run copyjs && tailwindcss -i sortiment/css/app.css -o sortiment/static/app.css --minify
